title: How can I not tilt?
body:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/uMq9Ozs.png[/img]

Anyone can tell me what do I do if I get people like this on my team? Can I go afk if I get ADC Veigar? Or do I need to waste my 30 minutes, because they won't surrender?

replies.body: You will lose anywhere from 40-60% of all games you play.  Accept that this is one of those 40-60% and move on with your life.  Accept that you will NEVER have 100% win rate (no one can) and this is an eventuality loss and you'll be happier with your life.  Whenever I get one of these games, I just shrug and add it to my 50-50% win/loss and move on to next game.  Not that big a deal.  Practice cs, practice fighting, put on music and wait for the end.  I never tilt from one of these because I don't expect to have average higher than 50-50% win/loss.
But they won't surrender at 15 min, idc if it's a lose, I care that they take my time for 40min and won't surr
If the game lasts 40 minutes, carries reach full build and kill differences mean very little. If you're able to survive that long, perhaps your teammates were correct not to surrender.

not much you can do about that. practice cs, practice fighting 1v1 with enemy if you find opportunity, if you don't have a record of afk, go afk.  games like these are not that common.  usually you get maybe 1 feeder and the other 4 people will tend to be willing to surrender at 20.
It sucks, but with scores that bad, the other team will likely end quickly anyway.
They didn't tho... and people won't surrender wasting my time
Shit happens. When you queue up for a game of League, you agree to play until defeat or surrender. We've all been there.
It's a defeat if they can't click the mouse

But just becuase you aren't having fun, why should others suit your needs?
unless you have chat logs of them saying that "fuck you we want to make your 30 minutes painful (maniacal screech)"
what if they want to have fun?
You want to win, but others want to have fun.

Lets say in a different situation:
You are a 0/22/1 ADC, however, your top lane sion is 15/2 and your jungle ekko is oneshotting the enemy tank, your mid lane lucian is 45/2/65 (do not mind the numbers), your team is actively trying to win the game, but is somehow in a stalemate. but the game in question is no longer fun for you, do you keep playing, surrender or what?
In a game like this just mute all, farm and participate in 0 teamfights, works all the time.

I like playing APC Veigar. I know it seems scary when you see something "new and different" while playing but there are many more strategies than what you are used to. I bet you've played on a "normal team" and saw scores similarly bad before. You have to open your mind to new ways of seeing before you can further develop as a Summoner.

Ints, and ruin your game. Waste 20min of your time. 
Good system Riot!
That isn't adc Veigar, that is Veigar bot lane. You act as if mages in the bottom lane weren't a thing earlier in the season.
When i get those kinds of players on my team, i just try and ignore their kda and play the game out. If the game is unwinable and they don't surrender at 15 or 20,then i just soft afk.
Not a bad idea, no point feeding the trolls the satisfaction of our time loss.
